LanguageData.VME_TerriblePlagueFestival.stages.0.desc: That plague festival was botched and the mood was way off. The corpse laid there, inert, and no holy miasma was liberated from it. What a waste of time!
LanguageData.VME_BoringPlagueFestival.stages.0.label: boring plague festival
LanguageData.VME_BoringPlagueFestival.stages.0.descri: That plague festival was repetitive and the killing technique was noticeably flawed. However the blessed plague is now among us.
LanguageData.VME_SatisfyingPlagueFestival.stages.0.de: That plague festival was satisfying and a holy miasma was liberated from the corpse, bathing us all in a sacred plague wind.
LanguageData.VME_SpectacularPlagueFestival.stages.0.d: The blood! The release! That plague festival brought everyone to the edge of a frenzy and a sacred plague wind wafted from the animal's corpse, blessing us.
